name: 3 Hints, 1 Answer - A Word Game to Puzzle and Stump your Brain for Education
name_original: 3 Hints, 1 Answer - A Word Game to Puzzle and Stump your Brain for Education
description:
'Fun, Play, People' - With only three hints, can you guess the word that describes them? 3 Hints, 1 Answer is a new word puzzle game that will keep your brain asking for more.

Each level in this new word game will present 3 hints and it's up to you to guess the word. Along the way, you can use Hints and Zaps to help you solve the puzzles. Hints will show a letter in the answer and the Zaps will remove a letter from the letter board.

Answer a level correctly and you'll earn more coins which you can use to buy more Hints and Zaps! If you need more help, just ask your friends on Facebook or Twitter.

3 Hints, 1 Answer is not only fun to play, but this game will also beef up your word association skills. Be warned, some players have found this so addicting they'll play it for hours with their friends and family!

Download 3 Hints, 1 Answer today!

"Fast going at first, then slows, then stumps. I played until I fell asleep!"

"Fun and challenging!"

"As a mother of 7 children, I am always looking for games that will entertain my children, but also educate them. As a special needs teach, I feel I can rate this game 5 stars because it helps develop word association skills in children and adults. Thank you!"
